22926D3453E03389.title: I won't get too attached to my Indium setup.

display.title: Indium Processing
description: As mentioned in the main sections of this quest book, this &&5Indium setup&&r has a limited lifetime, so don't stress over optimising every last detail.
Simply mix &&dPurified Galena&&r and &&eSphalerite&&r together with some &&aSulfuric Acid&&r to obtain &&9Indium Concentrate&&r, then combine with Aluminium Dust in a Chemical Reactor for your prize!

subtitle.text: Getting your first Indium has never been so fun.
